## Matrix4x4.mul() method

Multiplys two Matrix4x4's component-wise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static mul(a: Matrix4x4, b: Matrix4x4, result?: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | The first operand. |
|  b | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | The second operand. |
|  result | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | _(Optional)_ The output matrix (can be the same as a or b), if not specified, a new matrix will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)

The output matrix
